description.raw:
During the transition to the new packages server the testing IP was killed to obtain a permanent IP. This has been generating problems with the docker cache, like in this sdformat in r2d2:

[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/711/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/711/)

I’ve tested this PR on r2d2 same job:

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=711)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64/711/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/711/))
description.html:
During the transition to the new packages server the testing IP was killed to obtain a permanent IP. This has been generating problems with the docker cache, like in this sdformat in r2d2:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/711/

I’ve tested this PR on r2d2 same job:

https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/711/)

title.raw: Workaround for the non existant packages server IP
